DOC.brief_summary: Prospective Internet-Registry, Postmarketing-Surveillance, Registration and Follow-up of patients after Multi-Link VISION™ - Stent Implantation
DOC.brief_title: DaVinci Registry(Distinctly Assess Vision in Coronary Intervention)
DOC.detailed_description: A Non-Randomized prospective evaluation of the Multi-Link Rx Vision TM Coronary Stent System in the treatment of patients with De novo native coronary artery lesions
DOC.criteria: Women and Men Age >18 years, Intention to treat all stenosis with MultiLink VisionTM Stents, documented patient consent No MultiLink Vision™ Stent implanted, life expectation >9 M, cardiogenic shock, STEMI, NSTEMI or unstable angina pectoris with pathologic markers within the last 48 hours, intolerance of Clopidogrel/ Tiklopidin
